original_title: I Am Miranda: Chains, Chainsaws and the Cricket
overview: Dr. Thomas Warren reviews the previously classified footage caught by serial killers Leonard Lake and Charles Ng as they worked to kidnap women and torture them into sexual submission. This film seeks to analyze the criminal mind and pinpoint the precise motives, profiles and personalities of the murderers from the case who were not only caught, but are still at large today.
title: I Am Miranda: Chains, Chainsaws and the Cricket
